diet_types.description: A brief overview of the different types of diets.

calories_calculator.title: Calories Calculator

inbody_info.title: InBody Info

calorie_calculator.title: Calorie Calculator
activity_levels: Super active (very hard exercise or physical job)

diet_plans.gain: Weight Gain Diet: Increase your calorie intake by 300-500 kcal per day.
diet_plans.maintain: Maintenance Diet: Maintain your current calorie intake for a balanced lifestyle.
diet_plans.loss: Weight Loss Diet: Reduce your calorie intake by 300-500 kcal per day.

keto_diet.title: Keto Diet
keto_diet.description: The Keto diet is a low-carbohydrate, high-fat eating plan designed to induce a metabolic state called ketosis, where the body burns fat as its primary source of energy instead of carbohydrates.

steps.reduce_carbs: Reduce carbohydrate intake to below 50 grams per day.
steps.increase_fats: Increase consumption of healthy fats such as avocado, olive oil, and nuts.
steps.moderate_protein: Consume moderate amounts of protein to maintain muscle mass.

benefits_list.weight_loss: May support weight loss by promoting fat burning.
benefits_list.stabilize_sugar: Could help stabilize blood sugar levels and improve insulin sensitivity.
benefits_list.mental_clarity: Might enhance mental clarity and energy levels.

challenges_list.keto_flu: Initial adaptation phase may cause 'Keto Flu' symptoms such as fatigue and headaches.
challenges_list.strict_planning: Requires strict adherence and careful meal planning to sustain.

tips_list.consult_nutritionist: Consult a nutritionist before starting to ensure it aligns with your health needs.
tips_list.monitor_electrolytes: Monitor electrolyte levels and stay hydrated to prevent imbalances.
tips_list.whole_foods: Incorporate nutrient-dense, whole foods to maximize health benefits.

juice_diet.title: Juice Diet
juice_diet.description: The Juice Diet is a short-term dietary regimen that involves consuming only fresh fruit and vegetable juices for a specific period to detoxify the body and promote weight loss.

steps.choose_fresh: Choose a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables.
steps.use_juicer: Use a juicer or blender to extract the juice.
steps.replace_meals: Replace solid meals with juices for a duration of 3 to 7 days.

benefits_list.high_vitamins: Provides a high intake of vitamins and minerals.

challenges_list.low_protein: Low in protein and fiber, which may lead to hunger and muscle loss.
challenges_list.not_sustainable: Not sustainable as a long-term dietary solution.
challenges_list.weight_regain: Possible rapid weight regain after returning to a regular diet.

tips_list.consult_nutritionist: Consult a nutritionist before starting to ensure it's suitable for your health.
tips_list.stay_hydrated: Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated.
tips_list.avoid_sugar: Avoid adding sugar to juices to maintain their natural health benefits.
tips_list.monitor_response: Monitor how your body responds and discontinue if adverse effects occur.

intermittent_fasting.title: Intermittent Fasting
intermittent_fasting.description: Intermittent fasting is an eating pattern that cycles between periods of fasting and eating. It does not specify which foods to eat, but rather when to eat them.

steps.method_16_8: 16/8 Method: Fast for 16 hours and eat within an 8-hour window.
steps.method_5_2: 5:2 Method: Eat normally for 5 days a week and reduce calorie intake to 500-600 for 2 days.

benefits_list.weight_loss: May aid in weight loss and improve metabolism.
benefits_list.heart_health: Could help in improving heart health and reducing chronic disease risks.

challenges_list.hunger: May cause hunger and weakness initially.
challenges_list.not_suitable: Not suitable for everyone, especially those with certain medical conditions.

tips_list.consult_nutritionist: Consult a nutritionist before starting this regimen.
tips_list.stay_hydrated: Stay hydrated by drinking enough water during fasting periods.

low_carb_diet.title: Low-Carb Diet
low_carb_diet.description: The Low-Carb Diet focuses on reducing carbohydrate intake while increasing the consumption of proteins and healthy fats to promote weight loss and overall health improvement.

steps.avoid_high_carb: Avoid or limit high-carb foods such as bread, pasta, and rice.
steps.increase_vegetables: Increase consumption of non-starchy vegetables, proteins, and healthy fats.
steps.choose_protein: Choose protein sources like meat, fish, eggs, and nuts.
steps.use_healthy_oils: Use healthy oils such as olive oil and coconut oil for cooking.

benefits_list.weight_loss: May support weight loss and improve blood sugar levels.
benefits_list.cholesterol: Could help enhance cholesterol and triglyceride levels.
benefits_list.reduce_appetite: Might reduce appetite and promote a sense of fullness.

challenges_list.fatigue: May cause fatigue or dizziness initially due to carbohydrate reduction.
challenges_list.deficiencies: Could lead to nutrient deficiencies if meal planning is not well balanced.
challenges_list.sustainability: Might be difficult to sustain long-term due to food restrictions.

tips_list.consult_nutritionist: Consult a nutritionist before starting to ensure nutritional needs are met.
tips_list.stay_hydrated: Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated.
tips_list.monitor_body: Monitor how your body responds and adjust the diet as needed.
tips_list.fiber_rich: Choose fiber-rich carbohydrate sources like leafy vegetables.

weight_gain_diet.title: Weight Gain Diet
weight_gain_diet.description: The Weight Gain diet focuses on increasing calorie intake through nutrient-dense foods, ensuring a healthy and balanced weight gain approach.

steps.increase_calories: Increase daily calorie intake by 300-500 kcal.
steps.eat_more_protein: Consume more protein-rich foods like lean meats, dairy, and legumes.
steps.healthy_fats: Incorporate healthy fats from nuts, avocados, and olive oil.
steps.frequent_meals: Eat frequent meals and snacks throughout the day.

benefits_list.metabolic_rate: Helps maintain a balanced metabolic rate.

challenges_list.fat_gain: May lead to unhealthy fat gain if not properly managed.

tips_list.stay_hydrated: Stay hydrated and monitor micronutrient intake.
tips_list.strength_training: Incorporate strength training to maximize lean muscle gain.
tips_list.avoid_junk_food: Avoid excessive junk food intake to ensure quality weight gain.
